name: A Lion's Life
description:
Hello, we are Out-Caste Studios!  This is codename: A Lion's Life!  This project is a portfolio piece and there are currently no intentions to sell it.

If you wish to participate in playtesting we would greatly appreciate it!  Basically how it works is you fill out the pre-test form, play the game for as long or as little as you would like, then fill out the post-test form.

Pre-test Form: https://forms.gle/wuH6eKsvYBppHLkB8

Post-test Form: https://forms.gle/kQAb56p7vnoKjGGX7

We are also looking for a 3D artist to join our team!  If you are a reliable individual who is looking to add some art & animation to their portfolio then feel free to fill out this form!: https://forms.gle/cSFVgNQKKrSGZR9A6
